sentences: Billy Ray Latham (January 12, 1938, Arkansas â€“ August 19, 2018, Nashville, TN) was an American banjo player.
He was best known as a member of the Kentucky Colonels (1961-c.1974).
He then joined The Dillards in 1974, and left c.1978.
He died in 2018, having been in poor health for years.
